title: How many times can I try the screen unlock pattern before my phone becomes permanently locked? Can I unlock the phone by sending an email from my Gmail?
answer:
Your phone will not be permanently locked even if you incorrectly draw the unlock pattern for five consecutive times. Your phone will stop responding for 30 seconds. During this period, you can enter the backup PIN to unlock the screen. After 30 seconds, you can try again with your unlock pattern.

If you forget your unlock pattern and backup PIN, please send your phone to the local customer service center. Your phone cannot be unlocked using an email from Gmail.
